title: Super Mini Racing
description:
A super duper race is about to begin in just a few minutes!  Choose your car and take your position behind the wheel for Super Mini Racingâ€”a 3D racing game that offers both single-player and two-player modes.  You'll be driving super mini cars across 10 different racetracks, competing to be the winner and claim the prize. 
Controls
Single Player or Player 1

Steer: WASD keys
Respawn: R

Player 2

Steer: Arrow keys
Respawn: M

How to Play Super Mini Racing

Select either single-player or 2-player mode.
